meanings.definition: A member of the working class.
meanings.sent1: The proletarians worked hard in the factory.
meanings.sent2: The proletarians gathered to discuss their rights.
meanings.sent3: The proletarians joked about their long hours at work.
meanings.sent4: In the city, the lights shone on the busy proletarians.
meanings.sent5: The sound of machinery filled the ears of the proletarians.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the working class.
meanings.sent1: The proletarians movement aimed to improve conditions.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood had a proletarians feel with its small houses.
meanings.sent3: The cafe served proletarians-sized portions of food.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a proletarians tone, reflecting her roots.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit showcased proletarians themes of struggle and unity.
